subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Drew Gooden, who has played for three teams and six coaches in four seasons, agreed in principle on a three-year, $23 million contract and will re-sign with the Cavaliers, his agent said yesterday. The Cavaliers’ top rebounder last season, Gooden has been a solid complementary player to the All-Star forward LeBron James, who committed to a three-year contract extension with the Cavaliers in July.
